casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. SHANNON WILLIAM RICHMOND, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 2752-A DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten years imposed on November 8, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Ben Everett, of the Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Robert C. Sykes, Chairman; Peter G. Meloy.
